Apps_List.title: Lists all of the user applications.
Apps_List.description: Lists all of the user applications.

Apps_ListCortanaEndpoints.title: Gets the endpoint URLs for the prebuilt Cortana applications.
Apps_ListCortanaEndpoints.description: Gets the endpoint URLs for the prebuilt Cortana applications.

Apps_ListAvailableCustomPrebuiltDomains.title: Gets all the available custom prebuilt domains for all cultures.
Apps_ListAvailableCustomPrebuiltDomains.description: Gets all the available custom prebuilt domains for all cultures.

Apps_AddCustomPrebuiltDomain.title: Adds a prebuilt domain along with its models as a new application.
Apps_AddCustomPrebuiltDomain.description: Adds a prebuilt domain along with its models as a new application.

Apps_ListAvailableCustomPrebuiltDomainsF.title: Gets all the available custom prebuilt domains for a specific culture.
Apps_ListAvailableCustomPrebuiltDomainsF.description: Gets all the available custom prebuilt domains for a specific culture.

Apps_Import.title: Imports an application to LUIS, the application's structure should be included in in the request body.
Apps_Import.description: Imports an application to LUIS, the application's structure should be included in in the request body.

Apps_ListUsageScenarios.title: Gets the application available usage scenarios.
Apps_ListUsageScenarios.description: Gets the application available usage scenarios.

Apps_Update.title: Updates the name or description of the application.
Apps_Update.description: Updates the name or description of the application.

Apps_ListEndpoints.title: Returns the available endpoint deployment regions and URLs.
Apps_ListEndpoints.description: Returns the available endpoint deployment regions and URLs.

Permissions_Delete.title: Removes a user from the allowed list of users to access this LUIS application. Users are removed using their email address.
Permissions_Delete.description: Removes a user from the allowed list of users to access this LUIS application. Users are removed using their email address.

Permissions_List.title: Gets the list of user emails that have permissions to access your application.
Permissions_List.description: Gets the list of user emails that have permissions to access your application.

Permissions_Add.title: Adds a user to the allowed list of users to access this LUIS application. Users are added using their email address.
Permissions_Add.description: Adds a user to the allowed list of users to access this LUIS application. Users are added using their email address.

Permissions_Update.title: Replaces the current users access list with the one sent in the body. If an empty list is sent, all access to other users will be removed.
Permissions_Update.description: Replaces the current users access list with the one sent in the body. If an empty list is sent, all access to other users will be removed.

Apps_Publish.title: Publishes a specific version of the application.
Apps_Publish.description: Publishes a specific version of the application.

Apps_DownloadQueryLogs.title: Gets the query logs of the past month for the application.
Apps_DownloadQueryLogs.description: Gets the query logs of the past month for the application.

Versions_Import.title: Imports a new version into a LUIS application.
Versions_Import.description: Imports a new version into a LUIS application.

Versions_Update.title: Updates the name or description of the application version.
Versions_Update.description: Updates the name or description of the application version.

Versions_Clone.title: Creates a new version using the current snapshot of the selected application version.
Versions_Clone.description: Creates a new version using the current snapshot of the selected application version.

Model_ListClosedLists.title: Gets information about the closedlist models.
Model_ListClosedLists.description: Gets information about the closedlist models.

Model_AddClosedList.title: Adds a closed list model to the application.
Model_AddClosedList.description: Adds a closed list model to the application.

Model_DeleteClosedList.title: Deletes a closed list model from the application.
Model_DeleteClosedList.description: Deletes a closed list model from the application.

Model_GetClosedList.title: Gets information of a closed list model.
Model_GetClosedList.description: Gets information of a closed list model.

Model_PatchClosedList.title: Adds a batch of sublists to an existing closedlist.
Model_PatchClosedList.description: Adds a batch of sublists to an existing closedlist.

Model_AddSubList.title: Adds a list to an existing closed list.
Model_AddSubList.description: Adds a list to an existing closed list.

Model_DeleteSubList.title: Deletes a sublist of a specific closed list model.
Model_DeleteSubList.description: Deletes a sublist of a specific closed list model.

Model_UpdateSubList.title: Updates one of the closed list's sublists.
Model_UpdateSubList.description: Updates one of the closed list's sublists.

Model_ListCompositeEntities.description: Gets information about the composite entity models.

Model_AddCompositeEntity.description: Adds a composite entity extractor to the application.

Model_DeleteCompositeEntity.title: Deletes a composite entity extractor from the application.
Model_DeleteCompositeEntity.description: Deletes a composite entity extractor from the application.

Model_GetCompositeEntity.title: Gets information about the composite entity model.
Model_GetCompositeEntity.description: Gets information about the composite entity model.

Model_AddCompositeEntityChild.title: Creates a single child in an existing composite entity model.
Model_AddCompositeEntityChild.description: Creates a single child in an existing composite entity model.

Model_DeleteCompositeEntityChild.title: Deletes a composite entity extractor child from the application.
Model_DeleteCompositeEntityChild.description: Deletes a composite entity extractor child from the application.

Model_AddCustomPrebuiltDomain.title: Adds a customizable prebuilt domain along with all of its models to this application.
Model_AddCustomPrebuiltDomain.description: Adds a customizable prebuilt domain along with all of its models to this application.

Model_DeleteCustomPrebuiltDomain.title: Deletes a prebuilt domain's models from the application.
Model_DeleteCustomPrebuiltDomain.description: Deletes a prebuilt domain's models from the application.

Model_ListCustomPrebuiltEntities.title: Gets all custom prebuilt entities information of this application.
Model_ListCustomPrebuiltEntities.description: Gets all custom prebuilt entities information of this application.

Model_AddCustomPrebuiltEntity.title: Adds a custom prebuilt entity model to the application.
Model_AddCustomPrebuiltEntity.description: Adds a custom prebuilt entity model to the application.

Model_ListCustomPrebuiltIntents.title: Gets custom prebuilt intents information of this application.
Model_ListCustomPrebuiltIntents.description: Gets custom prebuilt intents information of this application.

Model_AddCustomPrebuiltIntent.title: Adds a custom prebuilt intent model to the application.
Model_AddCustomPrebuiltIntent.description: Adds a custom prebuilt intent model to the application.

Model_ListCustomPrebuiltModels.title: Gets all custom prebuilt models information of this application.
Model_ListCustomPrebuiltModels.description: Gets all custom prebuilt models information of this application.

Model_ListEntities.title: Gets information about the entity models.
Model_ListEntities.description: Gets information about the entity models.

Model_AddEntity.title: Adds an entity extractor to the application.
Model_AddEntity.description: Adds an entity extractor to the application.

Model_DeleteEntity.title: Deletes an entity extractor from the application.
Model_DeleteEntity.description: Deletes an entity extractor from the application.

Model_GetEntity.title: Gets information about the entity model.
Model_GetEntity.description: Gets information about the entity model.

Model_UpdateEntity.title: Updates the name of an entity extractor.
Model_UpdateEntity.description: Updates the name of an entity extractor.

Model_GetEntitySuggestions.title: Get suggestion examples that would improve the accuracy of the entity model.
Model_GetEntitySuggestions.description: Get suggestion examples that would improve the accuracy of the entity model.

Examples_Add.title: Adds a labeled example to the application.
Examples_Add.description: Adds a labeled example to the application.

Examples_Batch.title: Adds a batch of labeled examples to the application.
Examples_Batch.description: Adds a batch of labeled examples to the application.

Examples_Delete.title: Deletes the labeled example with the specified ID.
Examples_Delete.description: Deletes the labeled example with the specified ID.

Versions_Export.title: Exports a LUIS application to JSON format.
Versions_Export.description: Exports a LUIS application to JSON format.

Features_List.title: Gets all the extraction features for the specified application version.
Features_List.description: Gets all the extraction features for the specified application version.

Model_DeleteHierarchicalEntity.description: Deletes a hierarchical entity extractor from the application version.

Model_AddHierarchicalEntityChild.description: Creates a single child in an existing hierarchical entity model.

Model_UpdateHierarchicalEntityChild.title: Renames a single child in an existing hierarchical entity model.
Model_UpdateHierarchicalEntityChild.description: Renames a single child in an existing hierarchical entity model.

Model_ListIntents.description: Gets information about the intent models.

Model_AddIntent.description: Adds an intent classifier to the application.

Features_GetApplicationVersionPatternFea.description: [DEPRECATED NOTICE: This operation will soon be removed] Gets all the pattern features.

Features_CreatePatternFeature.title: [DEPRECATED NOTICE: This operation will soon be removed] Creates a new pattern feature.

Features_DeletePatternFeature.title: [DEPRECATED NOTICE: This operation will soon be removed] Deletes a pattern feature.
Features_DeletePatternFeature.description: [DEPRECATED NOTICE: This operation will soon be removed] Deletes a pattern feature.

Features_GetPatternFeatureInfo.title: [DEPRECATED NOTICE: This operation will soon be removed] Gets the specified pattern feature's info.
Features_GetPatternFeatureInfo.description: [DEPRECATED NOTICE: This operation will soon be removed] Gets the specified pattern feature's info.

Features_UpdatePatternFeature.description: [DEPRECATED NOTICE: This operation will soon be removed] Updates the pattern, the name and the state of the pattern feature.

Model_AddPrebuilt.description: Adds a list of prebuilt entity extractors to the application.

Train_GetStatus.title: Gets the training status of all models (intents and entities) for the specified LUIS app. You must call the train API to train the LUIS app before you call this API to get training status. "appID" specifies the LUIS app ID. "versionId" specifies the version number of the LUIS app. For example, "0.1".
Train_GetStatus.description: Gets the training status of all models (intents and entities) for the specified LUIS app. You must call the train API to train the LUIS app before you call this API to get training status. "appID" specifies the LUIS app ID. "versionId" specifies the version number of the LUIS app. For example, "0.1".

Train_TrainVersion.title: Sends a training request for a version of a specified LUIS app. This POST request initiates a request asynchronously. To determine whether the training request is successful, submit a GET request to get training status. Note: The application version is not fully trained unless all the models (intents and entities) are trained successfully or are up to date. To verify training success, get the training status at least once after training is complete.
Train_TrainVersion.description: Sends a training request for a version of a specified LUIS app. This POST request initiates a request asynchronously. To determine whether the training request is successful, submit a GET request to get training status. Note: The application version is not fully trained unless all the models (intents and entities) are trained successfully or are up to date. To verify training success, get the training status at least once after training is complete.
